Dashrath rescues Bunty and Babli from their mundane domestic lives by offering them to work for the nation, thwarting the activities of other scammers. This indicates that Dashrath has a role in protecting the nation and these two individuals were previously involved in criminal activities.

The policeman was certain that he had destroyed Bunty and Babli's careers as criminals by destroying their hearts, but it is not explicitly mentioned whether this destruction was physical or metaphorical.
